name: Huge Business INC.
description:
Huge Business INC.

funny lil 3 minute long game i made for the Out Of Stock game jam XD

Kind of meant to make fun of other horror games, also the first 'horror'-esc game i've ever released!

Browser build hasn't been released since it's a literal acid-trip of bugs (ex: click here )

Source-code: https://github.com/FlooferLand/huge-business (made with Godot 3.4.4)

Controls:

- WASD & Mouse for movement/looking around

- Press F to toggle the flashlight  |  Press E to interact

Subtitles only work for the in-game cutscenes because i got lazy XD
